description: Detects potential path traversal attempt via cmd.exe. Could indicate possible command/argument confusion/hijacking
author: xknow @xknow_infosec
Tim Shelton
false_positives: Java tools are known to produce false-positive when loading libraries
name: Potential CommandLine Path Traversal Via Cmd.EXE
query: ((((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"cmd.exe")) AND ((process.parent.command_line.text:("*\/c*" OR "*\/k*" OR "*\/r*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\/c*" OR "*\/k*" OR "*\/r*"))) AND ((process.parent.command_line.text:"/../../") OR (process.command_line.text:"*\/..\/..\/*"))) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*\\Tasktop\\keycloak\\bin\\\/..\/..\/jre\\bin\\java*"))
